paper.title: Constructing Bayesian networks to predict uncollectible telecommunications accounts

author.org: AT&T Bell Labs., Murray Hill., NJ, USA
AT&T Bell Labs., Murray Hill., NJ, USA

paper.abstract: The complexities of building models that can predict whether a customer account or transaction is collectible are greater than most current learning systems can handle. The authors describe software that builds Bayesian network models for such predictions. They also examine how varying model parameters and hence model structure can affect predictive accuracy.
